the hip-hop star says he's not interested in the job.`` I won't work with Simon Cowell on X Factor or American Idol,'' he tells British newspaper The Mirror this week. Simon Cowell has a good ear, but his Idol and X Factor acts don't dominate the charts in the States. Hip-hop does. Last year Sean Combs said he did want a job on American Idol when Simon Cowell announced he was leaving the TV show- but only if he earned the same amount as Simon Cowell . href="http://twitter.com/omgmusic"> Follow us

Entertainment Weekly`` Idol'' writer Annie Barrett said she's just looking forward to what feels like a whole new show.`` It will have to be, because there's no Simon Cowell ,'' she said. I have no idea what to expect, but I hope that it can be, if not a train wreck, then at least not boring. Without someone to be the villain, it's great if they all get along, but will that work on TV? Will it be compelling? Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Isnilon Hapilon al-Zarqawi, a Jordanian extremist who later led the Iraq branch of the al-Qaida terrorist network. Norman Schwarzkopf, commander of coalition forces, was unable to attend due to health reasons, but Colin Powell read a message from him. Though many years have passed, the events of 1991 remain some of the defining and proudest of this old soldier's life, he said.`` To celebrate the victories of Operation Desert Storm is to celebrate the union of 34 allied nations joined by the recognition that unprovoked aggression against a peaceful nation will not be tolerated.''
